extends java.lang.Object
utilities for working with files

    • checkFolderExistsOrMake

      public boolean checkFolderExistsOrMake​(java.io.File folder)
      Checks if the the given folder exists if not tries to create it
      Parameters:
      folder - the folder to check
      Returns:
      boolean true, in case a folder is present or successfully created else false

    • getFileNamesFromDir

      public java.lang.String[] getFileNamesFromDir​(java.io.File dir)
      gets list of all files from given directory
      Parameters:
      dir - directory to get files from
      Returns:
      a list of files

    • writeToFile

      writes a HashSet to specified file
      Parameters:
      filename - file to save the HashSet in
      URLS - HashSet to be saved

    • writeToFile

      writes a List to specified file
      Parameters:
      filename - file to save the List in
      list - List to be saved

    • getFromFile

      public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getFromFile​(java.lang.String file) throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
      gets the words from a file
      Parameters:
      file - file to get words in
      Returns:
      list of words
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException - exception if file not present
